name: Standing Fan

Client's 2 children sleep in the living room and their current fan cannot oscillate, resulting in 1 child usually not getting enough ventilation/ cooling.

If you have a suitable fan for donation please drop me a message at 92960569 or email me at muhammadsuffian@mws.sg. Thank you!
